name: Space Fighter
short_description:
Space Fighter is an action game written in Java. The destination is to stay alive a long time. You have to
control a space ship by mouse and/or keyboard. Your enemies are large asteroid fields and bad aliens.
You have heavy weapons on board like a laser gun, a rocket launcher who chooses its destination 
object, or a flash gun, who fills the screen with a green light and  destroys all surrounding enemies.
The soundtrack is an electronical orchestra sound with a nice atmosphere.
